dimension: 38 3/4 x 85 1/2 in. (98.4 x 217.2 cm) (without fringe and tassels)
medium: Cotton, linen, silk, wool; supplementary weft patterning
title: Cape (Tabrdouhte)
description: two tassels top center (26 inches); fringe, left and right side; loose threads on back, visible top and bottom; vertical bands of decoration (white, brown, black, gold and dark red). Woven fabric.
